title: Understanding the Ratio
text: Consider how often ASD is diagnosed in boys compared to girls. Think about the ratio or multiple that represents this difference.

title: Common Ratios
text: In many studies, boys are more frequently diagnosed with ASD than girls. The ratio is often expressed as a multiple. What are some common multiples you know?

title: Identifying the Correct Multiple
text: If ASD is five times as likely in boys as in girls, what is the multiple?
